Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.26435242 0.25810684 0.29210746 0.03699670 0.98866516 0.07272642
#>  [7] 0.74401953 0.67274213 0.54360260 0.34835843 0.21278623 0.02543132
#> [13] 0.66057225 0.16080230 0.07906945 0.11130968 0.70385159 0.33649906
#> [19] 0.56830563 0.60094035
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.56072626 0.19073031 0.52127526 0.49619429 0.54376693 0.34771868
#>  [7] 0.44354753 0.44516188 0.68650069 0.15571476 0.35087579 0.27847531
#> [13] 0.06310261 0.21069910 0.01542789 0.35663910 0.02339017 0.30620639
#> [19] 0.03544076 0.18806830

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.5529311 0.6856376 0.3726783 0.6927333 0.4559535 0.2082879 0.2677276
#>  [8] 0.1013690 0.6502456 0.5073694
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.012593681 0.907146348 0.005898639 0.194719072 0.886936277 0.517264339
#>  [7] 0.343254203 0.351824293 0.625611854 0.727066902
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.09145027 0.39356195 0.10791861 0.92381809 0.33959185 0.68907691
#>  [7] 0.24945870 0.37948260 0.88674722 0.87816425

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.63929216 0.53867839 0.02666964 0.64978497 0.58318731
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.04804454 0.27708245 0.71299785 0.27580516 0.90242242
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.002353027 0.291779806 0.266024884 0.824505156 0.556462449
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.4957506 0.8308351 0.6478373 0.6636605 0.1949339

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.8607592 0.1740228 0.8908651 0.3620185 0.7906421
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.6129205 0.9541460 0.9171691 0.2252125 0.2298208
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.92541628 0.12423562 0.08781878 0.58344868 0.47931279
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.7394215 0.6238553 0.3390601 0.1200491 0.9650120

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.69917696 0.01057088 0.53652637 0.56391388 0.70137087
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.8545088 0.6646447 0.9048222 0.1319890 0.7080519
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.532174321 0.003743212 0.197751403 0.698861790 0.703039798
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.6792061 0.6525461 0.7852049 0.6143694 0.4868519

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.3         2.3          4.4         1.3 versicolor
#> 2          7.7         2.8          6.7         2.0  virginica
#> 3          6.2         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor
#> 4          5.8         2.6          4.0         1.2 versicolor
#> 5          6.2         3.4          5.4         2.3  virginica
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.5         3.2          5.1         2.0  virginica
#> 2          5.8         4.0          1.2         0.2     setosa
#> 3          6.3         2.5          5.0         1.9  virginica
#> 4          5.8         2.7          4.1         1.0 versicolor
#> 5          6.2         2.8          4.8         1.8  virginica
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width   Species
#> 1          4.8         3.0          1.4         0.1    setosa
#> 2          4.6         3.6          1.0         0.2    setosa
#> 3          5.2         3.4          1.4         0.2    setosa
#> 4          6.3         2.8          5.1         1.5 virginica
#> 5          5.8         2.7          5.1         1.9 virginica

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.5         3.5
#> 2           5.6         3.0
#> 3           5.0         2.0
#> 4           7.6         3.0
#> 5           6.4         2.8
#> 6           6.9         3.2
#> 7           5.1         3.8
#> 8           6.1         3.0
#> 9           6.3         3.3
#> 10          6.3         2.5
#> 11          5.8         2.7
#> 12          6.9         3.1
#> 13          6.4         3.2
#> 14          6.5         3.0
#> 15          5.6         2.7
#> 16          4.9         3.1
#> 17          6.3         3.4
#> 18          5.8         2.7
#> 19          7.2         3.0
#> 20          5.4         3.4

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.2         4.1
#> 2          5.0         2.3
#> 3          4.8         3.1
#> 4          6.6         2.9
#> 5          6.1         2.8
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.3         2.7
#> 2          5.8         2.7
#> 3          6.4         3.2
#> 4          5.6         2.9
#> 5          6.5         2.8
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.8         3.0
#> 2          6.6         3.0
#> 3          5.1         2.5
#> 4          5.9         3.0
#> 5          7.2         3.2
